mutants.code:
def calculate_min_shots_to_win(shots, score):
    max_remaining_shots = 5 - shots if shots <= 5 else 0
    score_difference = abs(score[0] - score[1])
    if score_difference >= max_remaining_shots:
        return 1
    min_shots_needed = max(1, max_remaining_shots - score_difference + 1)
    return min_shots_needed
